short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Protecting your children from woke brainwashing on Youtube and Youtube Kids.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Don't let your kids fall victim to woke brainwashing online. 

Woke Blocker is a parental controls extension designed to create a safer viewing environment on YouTube and YouTube Kids by automatically blocking videos that contain discussions of gender/gender identity, sexuality, and race. 

Our goal is to provide users with content that aligns with their values, ensuring a viewing experience that is free from unwanted woke themes.
